resources.string: Have a taste of Japan\'s home box meal. Featuring sushi with smoked salmon, avocado and carrots, with the rice seasoned in sunflower seeds and soy sauce! In another section, we have broccoli and freshly cooked chicken, also covered in soy sauce. Have a taste of Japan\'s fried shrimps, complemented with a side of Japanese styled salad!

Taste the power of the dragon sushi! Features sticky rice, seaweed, smoked salmon, sesame seeds and carrots. Each piece of sushi is topped with freshly cut avocado, while the head has finely sliced avocadoes delicately put together.
A spicy and yet sour taste, this soup will be sure to provide an extremely spicy taste. Yet, it has rich flavours.
Homemade eggrolls using only the finest and freshest ingredients. Each bite gives a crunchy and savoury taste. The perfect harmony of ingredients!
Rice cooked with perfection! It is fried and mixed with a variety of fresh vegetables and meat!
Seasoned and cooked to perfection! The Asian Cuisine beef is mouth-watering and savoury!
Noodles coated with the finest soy sauce! Full of richness and flavor! Served with fried broccoli, carrots and asparagus.
Handmade fried dumplings made using the best meat and vegetables. Uses wrapping made entirely from scratch. All coated in soy sauce and very hot spices!
Handmade noodles mixed with green pepper, onions, beef and spicy chicken soup!
Unique dish with Thai rice never seen before here! The flavors shine for each bite! Complemented with eggrolls, grilled vegetables coated with our finest and special sauces, and our signature sauce!
Enjoy shopping for food from the comfort of your own home! This is MahShop.
Thank you for using my shopping application!
You must select a shipping option!
